CVE_CNA_GSMC.name: GS McNamara LLC
CVE_CNA_GSMC.description: GS McNamara LLC products and services, including the Floodspark portfolio, and any vulnerabilities discovered in components or projects that we are researching or coordinating that are not in another CNA’s scope

CVE_CNA_GOOGLE_ANDROID.name: Android (associated with Google Inc. or Open Handset Alliance)
CVE_CNA_GOOGLE_ANDROID.description: Android issues, as well as vulnerabilities in third-party software discovered by Android that are not in another CNA’s scope

CVE_CNA_SEAGATE.name: Seagate Technology
CVE_CNA_SEAGATE.description: Any Seagate or LaCie software or hardware, open or closed source, supported and end of life, as well as any vulnerabilities in third-party software discovered by Seagate that are not in another CNA’s scope

CVE_CNA_SNPS.name: Synopsys
CVE_CNA_SNPS.description: All Synopsys SIG products, as well as vulnerabilities in third-party software discovered by Synopsys SIG that are not in another CNA’s scope

CVE_CNA_CHECKMK.name: Checkmk GmbH
CVE_CNA_CHECKMK.description: All products of Checkmk GmbH including Checkmk and Checkmk Appliance

CVE_CNA_PANASONIC_HOLDINGS_CORPORATION.name: Panasonic Holdings Corporation
CVE_CNA_PANASONIC_HOLDINGS_CORPORATION.description: All products and services developed and/or sold by Panasonic Group companies

CVE_CNA_REDHAT.name: Red Hat, Inc.
CVE_CNA_REDHAT.description: Root Scope: The Red Hat Root’s scope includes the open-source community. Any open-source organizations that prefer Red Hat as their Root; organizations are free to choose another Root if it suits them better CNA Scope: Vulnerabilities in open-source projects affecting Red Hat software that are not covered by a more specific CNA. CVEs can be assigned to vulnerabilities affecting end-of-life or unsupported Red Hat software

CVE_CNA_ECLIPSE.name: Eclipse Foundation
CVE_CNA_ECLIPSE.description: Eclipse IDE and the Eclipse Foundation's eclipse.org, polarysys.org, and locationtech.org open source projects only

CVE_CNA_SAMSUNG_MOBILE.name: Samsung Mobile
CVE_CNA_SAMSUNG_MOBILE.description: Samsung Mobile Galaxy products, personal computers, and related services only

CVE_CNA_BHV.name: Biohacking Village
CVE_CNA_BHV.description: Vulnerabilities discovered by researchers in collaboration with Biohacking Village, with approval of Biohacking Village’s sponsors, that are not in another CNA’s scope

CVE_CNA_GOOGLEOSS.name: Google Open Source Software
CVE_CNA_GOOGLEOSS.description: Vulnerabilities in open source software published and maintained by Google

CVE_CNA_CANONICAL.name: Canonical Ltd.
CVE_CNA_CANONICAL.description: All Canonical issues (including Ubuntu Linux) only

CVE_CNA_AXIS.name: Axis Communications AB
CVE_CNA_AXIS.description: Supported Axis products and solutions only

CVE_CNA_GOOGLE.name: Google LLC
CVE_CNA_GOOGLE.description: Root Scope: Alphabet organizations CNA Scope: Google products that are not covered by Android and Chrome, as well as vulnerabilities in third-party software discovered by Google that are not in another CNA’s scope

CVE_CNA_ALIAS.name: Alias Robotics S.L.
CVE_CNA_ALIAS.description: All Alias Robotics products, as well as vulnerabilities in third-party robots and robot components (software and hardware), as well as machine tool and machine tool components, discovered by Alias Robotics that are not in another CNA’s scope

CVE_CNA_HASHICORP.name: HashiCorp Inc.
CVE_CNA_HASHICORP.description: All HashiCorp products and projects unless covered by another CNA’s scope

CVE_CNA_KEEPERSECURITY.name: Keeper Security, Inc.
CVE_CNA_KEEPERSECURITY.description: Keeper Security products and services only

CVE_CNA_AHA.name: Austin Hackers Anonymous
CVE_CNA_AHA.description: Vulnerabilities in the AHA! website and other AHA! controlled assets, as well as vulnerabilities identified in assets owned, operated, or maintained by another organization unless covered by the scope of another CNA

CVE_CNA_CYBERDANUBE.name: CyberDanube
CVE_CNA_CYBERDANUBE.description: All CyberDanube products, as well as vulnerabilities in third-party hardware/software discovered by CyberDanube or partners actively engaged in vulnerability research coordination, which are not within the scope of another CNA

CVE_CNA_HIKVISION.name: Hangzhou Hikvision Digital Technology Co., Ltd.

CVE_CNA_MEND.name: Mend
CVE_CNA_MEND.description: Vulnerabilities in Mend (formerly WhiteSource) products and vulnerabilities in third-party software discovered by Mend that are not in another CNA’s scope

CVE_CNA_TOSHIBA.name: Toshiba Corporation
CVE_CNA_TOSHIBA.description: Vulnerabilities related to products and services of Toshiba Corporation

CVE_CNA_KCFTECH.name: KCF Technologies, Inc.
CVE_CNA_KCFTECH.description: All KCF Technologies products including base stations, repeaters, numerous sensor types, and the SMARTdiagnostics cloud software

CVE_CNA_CISA.name: Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA)
CVE_CNA_CISA.description: Vulnerabilities that are (1) reported to or observed by CISA and (2) affect critical infrastructure, U.S. civilian government, industrial control systems, or medical devices, and (3) are not covered by another CNA’s scope

CVE_CNA_AIRBUS.name: Airbus
CVE_CNA_AIRBUS.description: All Airbus products (supported products and end-of-life/end-of-service products), as well as vulnerabilities in third-party software discovered by Airbus that are not in another CNA’s scope

CVE_CNA_DRUPAL.name: Drupal.org
CVE_CNA_DRUPAL.description: All projects hosted under drupal.org only

CVE_CNA_SECURIFERA.name: Securifera, Inc.
CVE_CNA_SECURIFERA.description: Vulnerabilities in vendor products discovered by Securifera, or related parties, while performing vulnerability research or security assessments

CVE_CNA_B_BRAUN.name: B. Braun SE
CVE_CNA_B_BRAUN.description: B. Braun’s commercially available products only

CVE_CNA_LARRY_CASHDOLLAR.name: Larry Cashdollar
CVE_CNA_LARRY_CASHDOLLAR.description: Third-party products he researches that are not in another CNA’s scope

CVE_CNA_RIBOSE.name: Ribose Limited
CVE_CNA_RIBOSE.description: All Ribose products and services, including open-source projects, supported products, and end-of-life/end-of-service products

CVE_CNA_DEVOLUTIONS.name: Devolutions Inc.
CVE_CNA_DEVOLUTIONS.description: Remote Desktop Manager and Devolutions Server products

CVE_CNA_GANDC.name: Glyph & Cog, LLC
CVE_CNA_GANDC.description: Xpdf open source project, including the xpdf viewer and associated command line tools

CVE_CNA_ACRONIS.name: Acronis International GmbH
CVE_CNA_ACRONIS.description: All Acronis products, including Acronis Cyber Protect, Acronis Cyber Protect Home Office, Acronis DeviceLock DLP, and Acronis Snap Deploy

CVE_CNA_THE_MISSING_LINK.name: The Missing Link Australia (TML)
CVE_CNA_THE_MISSING_LINK.description: TML vulnerability disclosure policy applies to any third-party vendor products to whom TML will assign the CVEs for vulnerabilities, if the product is not a part of another CNA scope

CVE_CNA_DEEPSURFACE.name: DeepSurface Security, Inc.
CVE_CNA_DEEPSURFACE.description: All DeepSurface products, as well as vulnerabilities in third-party software discovered by DeepSurface that are not in another CNA’s scope

CVE_CNA_GREENROCKETSECURITY.name: Green Rocket Security Inc.
CVE_CNA_GREENROCKETSECURITY.description: Green Rocket Security products including EOL unless covered by another CNA’s scope

CVE_CNA_FLEXERA.name: Flexera Software LLC
CVE_CNA_FLEXERA.description: All Flexera products, and vulnerabilities discovered by Secunia Research that are not in another CNA’s scope

CVE_CNA_ZUSO_ART.name: ZUSO Advanced Research Team (ZUSO ART)
CVE_CNA_ZUSO_ART.description: Vulnerabilities in third-party products discovered by ZUSO ART that are not in another CNA’s scope
